level_selection.question: What level of security maturity do you want to implement?
level_selection.description: Select the desired security level for your DevSecOps pipeline. Levels range from basic security measures (Level 1) to advanced, comprehensive security practices (Level 5).

pipeline_selection.question: Which pipeline stages would you like to implement?
pipeline_selection.description: Select the pipeline stages you want to include in your DevSecOps implementation.
